text: 🚨 Energy War Alert! 🚨Russia's relentless destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure threatens to send European energy prices skyrocketing! 💸🔥The former chief executive of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, Andriy Kobolyev, warns that if Russia's attacks continue unchecked, it will have a "dramatic negative effect" on energy prices. 💢Ukraine needs more weapons to defend its energy infrastructure, or there won't be an economy left to rebuild! 💪🏽🔍The recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west has already caused a significant spike in European gas prices. 📉🔥The damage inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. 😱🔫We must act now to support Ukraine and prevent a catastrophic energy crisis! 🌟💪🏽
